Description:
Detects Obfuscated use of stdin to execute PowerShell

Author: Jonathan Cheong, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation STDIN+ Launcher
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where command re 'cmd.{0,5}(?:/c|/r).+powershell.+(?:\$\{?input\}?|noexit).+\"'
